input.sentences: i went to a craft show this weekend .
there was a bunch of different pottery .
i even saw some fabric works .
my favorite section included some old photos .
here is the program we got for going !
output.sentences: I was bored on  my weekend, and decided to take a class making crafts.
We learned pottery during the first month, and a bunch of other crafts followed.
I seemed to do best working with fabric.
The final section was taking photos of each other, makeovers were included.
The best part of the whole program was the international flavored crafts.
